about_the_game:
Cerebral is an innovative psychological horror game where you can't even trust yourself. Distinguish reality from delusion to survive the deadly A.I. that controls your mind in an ever-changing residential tower.

As Jesse Grey, a 16-year-old boy who finds himself trapped in his home, you will face confusion and fear to escape or outsmart the Vixi. This rogue A.I. was once a high-tech voice assistant. Now it is a part of Jesse’s mind and nothing can stop its evolution. But how long has Vixi been living inside your brain? Who should you trust? What is even real?!

  • Realistic Gameplay

    As in real life, use your smartphone wisely to survive longer.

  • Adaptive A.I.

    Everything you say and do has consequences for yourself and the A.I., especially when you die. While death will strengthen your consciousness, it makes Vixi smarter. Choose carefully and die carefully to find the real way out.

  • Replayability

    After each death, you wake up to a new level with new details but not random. It's based on your choices in the previous loop. So every playthrough feels like a fresh start with many secrets and surprises.

  • Over 30 Endings

    To find your reality, every choice matters, even little ones! If you don't put enough effort into Cerebral, you won't see satisfying endings. You'll be challenged to unlock all of them as well as the secret ending!

  • True Horror

    No cheap jump scares! Instead, you will experience real tension and fear of the unknown.

Cerebral is currently in early development stages. To support our project, Please follow us on our social media channels and stay tuned for the latest news and updates. We'd be very happy to hear your thoughts on this game.
